name: Something Is Wrong
description:
Developers;

E. Yusuf Aytac - Coder/Scriptwriter/Level Designer

M. Emirhan Kul - Coder/SFX Designer

Hatice Bayramoğlu - Designer

Controls;

"W" : Forward

"A" : Leftward

"S" : Backward

"D" : Rightward

"E" : Interact With Objects

"Mouse" : Rotate

Prepared Assets;

LowPoly Water

Cartoon VFX - Pack

Everything else belongs to us...

Warning;

I suggest you pay attention to the objects while playing this game.

-*Made for at0mjam-

"There is no story left to be told."
